mapper.sql: SELECT p.id, p.create_time, p.create_by, p.username, p.nickname, p.mobile, p.email, p.gender, p.user_status, p.avatar, p.dept_id, sd.dept_name, p.remark, GROUP_CONCAT(sr.role_name) role_names FROM sys_user p LEFT JOIN sys_dept sd ON sd.id=p.dept_id LEFT JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.user_id=p.id LEFT JOIN sys_role sr ON sr.id=sur.role_id
mapper.select:
AND p.create_time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{q.createBegin},'%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{q.createEnd},'%Y-%m-%d 23:59:59')
AND (p.username LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q.username}, '%') OR p.nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q.username}, '%'))
AND p.mobile = #{q.mobile} AND p.email LIKE CONCAT('%', #{q.email}, '%') AND p.user_status = #{q.userStatus}
AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_dept sd WHERE sd.id = p.dept_id AND (sd.id = #{q.deptId} OR FIND_IN_SET(#{q.deptId},sd.ancestors)))
AND EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role sur WHERE sur.user_id=p.id AND sur.role_id=#{q.roleId})
GROUP BY p.id
